1b1: rgya gar skad du Ar+ya ma hU~M ba ran d+hA NA nI ma mo hUM yon hU~MH/ bod skad du/
1b2: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs
1b3: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shi na/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nyen kor
1b5: shing sa la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad
1b6: bcus bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chungs zla ba nya ba'i nang par yongs su mya ngan
1b7: las 'da' ba'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du shin
1b8: tuzur phyin par don brda sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ srid pa'i rtse mo man cad go bar mdzad de/ deng

2a1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig tan thams cad la thugs bcu ba can/ 'dzag rten thams cad slob pa/ sems can thams cad la/
2a2: gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa skyabs chen po'i gnas dang gzhi por gyur pa thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ sems can thams cad kyi zhub lung bstan pa
2a3: tha ma la de lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang shel gyi kha dog
2a4: dang rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'dra
2a5: dang yi dgas dang lha ma yin dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la phog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang ngan song dang / mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to// nga nas
2a6: mya ngan chen pos non te tshig 'thun par kye ma khebs so khebs so zhes kyang zer to/ / kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdobs shing lus 'dir zhing shin tu ngu'o// de'i tshe
2a7: sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas ri dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing / 'di skad du grogs po dag rings grogs po dag rings
2a8: gyad yul gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dong ngo 'dong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bzlog la bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa 'am/ bskal

2b1: pa las lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes zer to/ / gcig la gcig 'jus nas 'di skad tu/ kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kyem sems can
2b2: rnams kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zad do/ / las mi bzad pa ni byung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag sgyur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag smrar cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ deng gi
2b3: yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye mi 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ bdag cag mgon med pa dang
2b4: rtsa lag med pa dang phongs par ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ bdag cag gi the tshom dang som nyi ci dang ce yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o zhes kyang zer to// nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de 'di lta ste gnas brtan kA
2b5: tA ya na chen po dang gnas brtan paklu la dang gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ dam dam rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs
2b6: rab tu 'khrugs/ brtabs rab tu brtabs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu'ur 'ur/ 'khams rab tu 'khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rengs rab tu rengs te/ de dag la sogs pa dag du gyur nas chas so// de'i tshe dag
2b7: slongs ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas brtan de dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba des phog nas shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te gcig la gcig 'jus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag
2b8: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa cad shes pa gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa seng ge chen

3a1: po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi pa spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar
3a2: dmang ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen
3a3: po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
3a4: phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzang ma la sogs pa dag
3a5: slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso mo chen mo// chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa
3a6: sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang dge slong mnye dga' mo dang dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang de la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad
3a7: kyib spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i
3a8: phyir dang gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsad pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der

3b1: dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig du 'khod do//
3b2: 'khor ngan dge / slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi mchogs bcu thob pa sha sta ga ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs dang bud med kyi dbyibs dang sha dang khrag dang rgyus pa mang po dang rus pa'i lus
3b3: 'chang brtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa byang chub sems
3b4: dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang mi mchogs bcu thob pa/ thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b5: dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres pa theg pa chen
3b6: po la sred pa theg pa chen po la ser sna mang pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral par bya'o snyam ste/ sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du tshul khrims kyi bkod
3b7: ba'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa/ 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam
3b8: pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams

4a1: cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro'i nyi ma 'chang kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang
4a2: ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/ theg pa chen po'i mchog du gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa
4a3: dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
4a4: 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang tshig dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i
4a5: dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dge snyen gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba dang rtag pa dang mi rtag
4a6: pa dang bdag yod pa dang bdag med pa dang stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang de kho na ma yin pa dang skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa dang sems can dang sems can med pa dang brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa dang /
4a7: zhi ba dang zhi ba ma yin pa dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang byung ba/
4a8: du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas

4b1: kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen
4b2: po la ser sna med pa 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ / bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung me
4b3: 'chadang par bya'o/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba
4b4: bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir re res kyang tsan dan dang a ga ru dang thang shing gi mchog dang
4b5: tsan da nas mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang yam sreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa yon tan can lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs so/ / da la yam sreg shing sna re zhing yang gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs
4b6: bdun dang ldan pas spras pas dkris pa/ ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ snga re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
4b7: phung po chen po/ mdog sngo ba dang bar bar kha cig du mdog dkar kha cig du sngo skya kha cig du rtsa dmar kha cig du ser ba mig ru sdug par byas pa sha stag go// bam po re re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun
4b8: las byas pa sha stag go/ chings ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang zar me'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang sngon po dang ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go/ de la chings ma'i the gu

5a1: mang po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa/ yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba sha stag go// de la yam sreg shing sA re zhing yang spos dri bsung zhim po dang me tog phreng dang gung /
5a2: gram gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser thags kyis g.yogs pa dang snas brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shugs sngon po dang ser po dang sngo skya dang dkar po dang btsod ka lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka ling
5a3: ka'i ras dang zar ma'i ras dang zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa byug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gis byugs pa sha stag go// yam sreg shing sna re'i shing rta re re zhing yang
5a4: rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa gser gyis mdzes par byas pa kha cig/ kha cig du sngon po dang dkar po dang bab la'i kha dog dang li khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ shing rta de dag gi
5a5: gnya' shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ dpe med pa rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go// rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs pas mgyogs pa/ spu kha chu sbyar gyi mdog dang ldong ros kyi mdog
5a6: dang sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha
5a7: stag go/ rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su yang gdugs rtsibs dang rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa 'od can las byas pa mu tig gi chun po sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang gser gyi me tog
5a8: kumud dang ud pa la dang pad ma dkar po sdong bu bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa bung pa mang po skad 'byin pa dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba 'od dang ldan pa che ba mang ba sha stag dang lda ldi chen po

5b1: sha stag khyer ro/ / lnga ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i yas kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so// ri mo'i gzugs re re'i klo g.yas g.yon nas kyang / zlos gar gyi gang thabs
5b2: yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang rnga zlum dang bI bang dang glang bu dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang rnga bo che dang dung
5b3: la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do/ / gar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa rjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to// gar thabs kyi
5b4: sil snyan re re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi bye mas rin po che'i skon bu legs par bcas pa gzhon sha can dag bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po
5b5: blta na sdug pa/ gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba sha stag thogs so// de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dod/
5b6: do// zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsan dan dmar po dang a ga ru dang thang shing gi me chung dus btsos pa dang gang gA'i klung gi chus btsos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang lan tshwa'i ro dang dang ra ba dang ska ba dang tsha ba dang /
5b7: kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa mdangs skyed pa phan par 'gyur pa sha stag go/ sa la zung gi drung gi nyen kor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bad la ti/ ga bu sha'i ras dang snam bu dang btsos snam dang dre'u
5b8: rngog dang ka ling ka'i ras dang zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo / / grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug kyang gur gum gyis byugs so// bcom ldan

6a1: 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so/ / g.yog
6a2: ma yang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kasma si li li dang / khrol shang gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ rgya dar spu sdug yug khyim chen
6a3: po'i bla re rnams ni bres/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi tshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yabs/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma kar rten pa'i kha nas/ zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer
6a4: ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing sbyangs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas gtor to// dge snyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
6a5: sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no/ / skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin no// mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar
6a6: 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no/ / dbul po dang bkren pa dang phongs pa rnams la yang 'dod pa dang dug dang gnod pa dang ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dag chog
6a7: par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni ci yang mi sems so// de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sde tshan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs
6a8: pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' shig

6b1: snying la sems shing yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog du sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i
6b2: yo byad bud shing dang yam sreg shing dang shing rta dang rgyal mtshan dang gdugs dang ba dan rnams dang chas te zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
6b3: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang me tog phreng ba dang / phye ma dang phye ma zhib bu dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang bla re chen po dag gis
6b4: mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te/ mig nas mchi ma rgyan mi 'chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig
6b5: nyen stongs par 'gyur ro zhes de skad du skang po che 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na srog chags shi shu mar bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
6b6: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol par ci ga nang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol
6b7: zhes gsol ba 'debs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur ro// de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du
6b8: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/ bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du

7a1: shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ / de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu
7a2: 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen mtshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge
7a3: bsnyen ma gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad bcu
7a4: rtsa bzhi las lhag pas bsdus pa'o/ / lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i dri ma mnam pa'o// lus 'di ni khyi ro rul ba'i dri bam gyis
7a5: lhag par sbags pa'o/ / lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o// lus 'di ni sha dang chub dang rus pa dang khrag dang lpags pa'i zhal zhal can rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang ra ba dang ba gam can/ mig gi skar khung
7a6: can/ mgo bo'i yang tog can/ yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sog
7a7: pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba skyed kyi srin pos brten pa/ 'dam bu dang e ran Da dang dbu ba dang chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dpa' rlabs ltar shin du mi brtan pa'o// sgyu ma dang smig
7a8: rgyu dang brag cha dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yangs na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyad ki

7b1: dang wa dang bya rgod dang bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te/ ba lang gi rmig rjes su blugs par ni nus srid kyi/ lus nad bzhi rgya rtsa
7b2: bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa 'am mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis brtan par mi nus so/ / sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag du byas pa'am yungs 'bru tsam 'am rdu la phra rab kyi
7b3: rdul tsam sha stag du byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar//
7b4: bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgoms pa sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang
7b5: dge bsnyen ma dpal phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/
7b6: bsrung bskur len pa bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang lus snying po med do snyam du smod pa so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor log zhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos
7b7: skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa
7b8: dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha

8a1: chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de
8a2: dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las bcom ldan
8a3: 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ rus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po
8a4: la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsa byi gzhon nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa gang
8a5: gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur/
8a6: pa sha stag la de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang mdzod dang bang pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang bdud rtsi gnas par
8a7: bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing log par lta ba rnams kyi lte bcad par bya'o zhes legs par dam bcas pa tshul khrims 'chal pa
8a8: tshul khrims la mi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul pa/ dam pa'i chos sdug pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim gro bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa

8b1: d ge 'dun la phan pa dang bde bar gnas par bya ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang des chog go snyam du sems pa dang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du yi dam
8b2: bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste li tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma'i dri ma med pa snying po zhes bya ba dang / bsgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang gA'i
8b3: chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa li tsa byi gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i bud shing zang shing gi mchog dang tsan dan dang a ga du rnams
8b4: dang yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo // ling tsa byi gzhon nu re re zhing yang glang po che
8b5: brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chos glang po che re re'i mdun du yang / che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan
8b6: dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so// gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang / kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad gcig yod do// dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang
8b7: chu zheng du dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod do/ / rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do// ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad
8b8: stong du phyin no/ / de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las bcom ldan 'das cad mi

9a1: gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus tal bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling
9a2: pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang gla lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams
9a3: kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang chos skyong zhes bya ba dang de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te/ de dag thams
9a4: cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas/ mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar
9a5: gyur te re thag chad na sa langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med
9a6: p a'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang ri khrod kyi grong dang yul po che dang kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang
9a7: gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ / rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmag 'phrul sa ya phrag bcwa brgyad bcwa brgyad yod do// de dag la glang po che rtag tu
9a8: 'jam pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dag dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyes gyur gyis ches

9b1: bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so// de dag gi mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang dpag tshad brgyad bcu
9b2: chu rke gab par 'dug go/ / ba dan gyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pas kyang dpag tshar brgya stong du byin no// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad sum bcu yod do// de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba
9b3: dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal ba rnams kyi sar ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus
9b4: kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro// snyam du sems pa sha
9b5: stag dang bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o/ / dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drung nas gcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang 'jig rten
9b6: thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to// de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni
9b7: nyi sa'i 'od kyis mi phog go/ / de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol
9b8: pa btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo mo gtogs par ya ngas pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig

10a1: rten gsum na mangs sa la sogs pa'angam bu'i gling ba'i rgyal po dang tshong pon dang khyim bdag rnams kyi rlung ba gang gA'i klung bdun gyi khyim snyed dang lhan cig tu lags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bungs
10a2: gzugs kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol brtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon po med pas sems rnam par dag pa shasag ste// 'dig su yangs pa can gyirgya
10a3: bo'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes mazhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bri yang gu zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la b+ha ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag /
10a4: lagacig 'dus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam breg shing rnams khyer te mchod pa snga ma thams cad dang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
10a5: nyi myur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang bdan dang gdugs rnams kyi 'bang dang chu zheng gi tshad byung snga ma'i nyes gyur pas lhag go// kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung ni dpag tshad
10a6: brgyad du khyab par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing sgra 'bal la rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor
10a7: shing skad mi snyan pas du ste/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sa la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya
10a8: ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po dag ltos grogs po dag ltos mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad

10b1: bar du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ mchod pa bkur sti thams cad mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma pa zhes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la
10b2: gsol ba 'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar
10b3: bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de bzhin gshegs par mdzad cig/ grogs po rag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no// de bas kyang
10b4: zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no/ / kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// lha de dag thams cad kyang
10b5: theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la
10b6: sred pa theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang 'chab pa dang sgyu med pa theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul
10b7: khrims blangs pa 'jig rten dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum
10b8: gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa go cha chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig

11a1: rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag
11a2: kyang sngams phul ba'i yam sreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i wu rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba mi la dkon pa sha stag go/ / shing ta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba dar la dkar pos gson
11a3: pa gzugs dang dbyibs ri mo brir yang mi nus pa dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang / gar thabs dang rol mo yid du
11a4: 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa/ kha zas zhim po mang po dag dang / seng ge khri bai dUr+ya'i rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang
11a5: me tog dri bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa me tog gi sil ma bkran zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing mchog tu sdug
11a6: bsngal bas gdungs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa ste
11a7: tshegs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti'i mchog rnam pa mang po dag byas te bskor ba yang
11a8: byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan nams phog cing gtor nas rang rang gi skra 'bal cing skad mi snyan pas du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun pa

11b1: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis
11b2: ma bzhes te cang mi gsung nas de dag re thag chad de langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs
11b3: b kru'i rgyal po gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis gyur pas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan
11b4: 'das kyi thad du dong ste phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe na ma thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi
11b5: bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'jus nas rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil gyis mnan nas/ tshogs chen po dang chas te
11b6: lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khor ro// gzhan yang
11b7: d e'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams
11b8: zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe dri zil/

12a1: bdag po mis byin gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po gang gA'i klung sum bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas de bzhin
12a2: gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo snyan dgu byas nas phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur
12a3: te langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms
12a4: pa bas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legra
12a5: m thong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur khyer pa las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod
12a6: do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang gA'i klung drug bcu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa lha ma yin gyi bsam pa med pa sha
12a7: stag gis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur nyis gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas ma bzhes te yid mi dga' bar gyur nas langs te shing sa la zung gi drung du
12a8: rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gang gA'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang gA'i klung bdun bcu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing

12b1: s nang ba chen po dang ldan pa sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis gyur nyis gyur pas bzang ba dag khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi
12b2: dga' bar gyur te/ shing sa la zung gi bar du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po gang gA'i klung
12b3: brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sa la zung gi drung du snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang
12b4: d e'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri srel la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po gang gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad pas nyis gyur nyis gyur kyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs
12b5: khyer nas khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang / bud pa rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang / lo mkha 'bus pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
12b6: gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur pas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas
12b7: phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can legs mthong ma la sogs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa'i nyis
12b8: gyur pas lhag pa dag khyer te/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo ram b+ha dang / u rba shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gar

13a1: gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma'i nyes gyur nyis gyur pas ches lhag par mang zhing spa ba dag gis mdun du drangs te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i
13a2: 'byung po'i tshogs papa sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang gA'i
13a3: k lung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur nyis gyur pas lhag pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
13a4: bzhes nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe rlung lha bzhi rlung gtong ba'i lha gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par yang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing dang shing gel
13a5: pa dang nags ma rnams dang snye ma dang me tog gi 'khri shing dang / byi ru rnams kyis sa phyogs rgyan par byed cing dus tshigs thams cad kyi me tog gi dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la lo mkha 'bus pa rtsa ba dmar ba
13a6: rnams kyis shing sa la zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po dza kong khar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur pas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin
13a7: du shing sa la zung gi drung du 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sngo
13a8: pa'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sgra ngal nas sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zim bu bsil ba dang 'das pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag

13b1: chad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i me bsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang / lung tang mdog dang / sbrang rtsi mdog sel dang / 'dod
13b2: dgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gangs kyi sman dang / pad ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing rta
13b3: chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / 3/ su dang / pad ma dkar po dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang rdo gu sna tha dad pa du ma dag sna'i thor tos byung zhing byung zhing khyer te rlung
13b4: gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas pad ma'i mdab ma bcer ba'i seng ge'i khri lnga lding dag bshams te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
13b5: byas nas zhal zas ma bzhes nAr thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng ge gang gA'i klung sum bcu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi
13b6: 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te rings par lhags nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe'i bye dang pa dang
13b7: khrung khung dang ngu ra pa dang ka dam pa dang thal mo dang gzhad dang khu bug dang ba li ka dang / / ka la bi nga ka dang shar shar te'u la sogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te rang rang
13b8: gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang ma he mo dang ram mo yod do cog nu ma 'o mas bkang ste shin tu rings par lhags nas shing sa la zung gi drung nas phyogs gshod

14a1: zhig mthong nas/ der rang rang gi nu ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang / bye ma dang ba tshas ma 'gags shing tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzags te/ 'o ma de dag gi nang nas sbrang bu
14a2: dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa gling bzhin gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang gA'i gling //
14a3: dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam sreg shing dang / zhal zas dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod to// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srung chen po la sogs
14a4: pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtogs par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so/
14a5: gzhan yang de'i tshe ri rab la sogs pa ri chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi ri gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing mang po nye tshen gyi grib ma byed pa dang / brag zang
14a6: yag grib mche ba dang / zag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang / sman gshong rdo gu dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so// lha'i bu mthu bo che'i 'dun ma chen po dag kyang ri rab dang bcas te mchod
14a7: pa'i phyir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che 'od chen po rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gan
14a8: pa gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma pas nyis gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar me'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis nyi ma'i 'od zil/

14b1: gyis mnan te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa de bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan
14b2: 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi nas shing sa la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la khang bzangs ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu dang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis
14b3: 'khrigs par gyur to/ / sa gzhi ni bskyed mo tshal dang rdzing bu'i chu pad mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi bskyed mos chal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu na dga' ba'i tshal
14b4: dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang lha dang / lha ma yin dang mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu ngu'o// gzhan
14b5: yang de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces zer te/ grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las
14b6: khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas
14b7: mchod pa bya'o/ / zhal zas kyi tha ma yang dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chen po
14b8: thob par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pas ma'i nyis gyur gyi mchod pa dang zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro// me tog mang po dag khyer te/

15a1: 'di lta ste/ man dA ra ba rnams dang / man dA ra ba chen po rnams dang / ke ke ru ka rnams dang / ke ke ru ka chen po rnams dang / man dzu sha ka rnams dang / man dzu shaka chen po rnams dang / san tan ka rnams
15a2: dang / san tan ka chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can rnams dang / 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang / dga' byed
15a3: rnams dang / dga' byed chen po rnams dang / dri mchog rnams dang / dri mchog chen po rnams dang / spos kyi dang ldang rnams dang / spos kyi ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / kun tu dad ldang rnams dang / kun du dad ldang chen po rnams
15a4: dang / mtha' yas ngad ldang rnams dang / mtha' yas ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi mdab ma rnams dang / klung gi me tog rnams dang / yod 'dus brtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas bcom ldan
15a5: 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
15a6: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis gyur de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang /
15a7: yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang / dri gsung chen po rnams khyer ro// khang bzangs chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ them skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang
15a8: sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

15b1: brtsam ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo'o snga tshan srang ba lags na bdag cag 'thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gas bral ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ de skad ces gsal kyang 'al zas ma barbe
15b2: nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / bam po gnyis pa/ de'i rjes la mthar kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang 'od snga ma las khyad
15b3: par du 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na gdugs pal pa gang yin pa yang kho ra khor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo// ba dan pal ba gang yin pa de yang rgya mtsho chen
15b4: po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug ste/ rlung gis bskyod dam rlung gis phyar na ba dan de dag las bi bang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyil pa lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de
15b5: dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtog
15b6: par gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / mi
15b7: ' dzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gzi byin zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa'i tshigs chen po dang chas
15b8: te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ de dag gi ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste shing sa la zung gi drung du thug go/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas pa zhes par gsol

16a1: ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas tshangs
16a2: pa dang dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par de'i bar gyi lha yod do cog gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang / rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dang chas te bcom ldan 'das
16a3: kyi thad du song ngo / / de'i gdugs phal pa yang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas langs te//
16a4: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams cad phye nas de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/
16a5: de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/ sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yid rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang
16a6: dbugs phyung ngo / / sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing me chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan
16a7: pa'i 'du shes bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to/ / de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / ral gri dang tho ba dang dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa
16a8: dang / mtshon kam pa na dang / lugs kyi ber ka dang / lcags mda' dang / sha ta ka ni ha dang / mda' dang 'phang mdung dang / mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha rnam pa du ma yongs su spangs te chos lhur len par

16b1: gyur to/ / de'i mchod pa yang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du yang 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i khyon tsam mo// de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rba//
16b2: yab kyis g.yo ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
16b3: bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nga slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yi dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
16b4: kyi bu mo gang su yang rung 'jigs pa'i slad du 'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i slad du 'am/ thob tu re ba'i slad du 'am/ gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal pa 'am/ gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du yang rung ste/ thegs
16b5: chen po rjod par bgyid na de'i don du 'jigs pa dang / mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ thag ke Ta Ta ra thag ke/ ro ru re/ ma da ro ru re/ A la mA la tA la swA hA// chos smra
16b6: pa 'khrul pa dang 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu skyegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du
16b7: bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa 'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du bsrung ba'i gzungs
16b8: s ngags kyi don du rjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni rjod pa tsam gyis ji ltar ru sbal rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du bdag gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi stobs dang

17a1: ldan par yang bgyid lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis nga zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
17a2: sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol pa ma 'debs shig/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur bas na bzhes par bya'i/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin
17a3: gyis/ sdig can khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan
17a4: 'das la gsol ba btab pa las ma bzhes te ra thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar
17a5: te rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag cha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen po nyis gyur pas lhag pa
17a6: dag khyer nas der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de yang chu zhing du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nas
17a7: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te lan du ma bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
17a8: to/ / bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sprad pu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rdog la thog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das

17b1: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsal bar ci ga nang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs
17b2: te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid
17b3: 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi bu bo nyan thos lus chen mtha' ya
17b4: la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan
17b5: las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song shig/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang khyer te song la de la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
17b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig/ khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par
17b7: zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
17b8: la bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas

18a1: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu'ur 'ur/ shig sheg rab tu
18a2: shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo// de la sogs pa byas te sa chen po rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha ma yin dang /
18a3: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas spyi bung zhes byas te 'jigs shing kha dang rgog ma skams nas 'bros par chas te rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to//
18a4: de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang
18a5: ma'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
18a6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi 'dzed
18a7: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
18a8: bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma phul la/ khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang

18b1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'di btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyod kyi 'od nyams par gyur to//
18b2: de 'ong ba la rjes su yid rang bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la yang ltos shig ces byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thams
18b3: cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo / / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
18b4: 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
18b5: dag kyang ltos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid che ba yin te rang rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyed la zhal ston par mdzad do// 'khor de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs
18b6: pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces bla zhing 'bod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu
18b7: med pa dag gis bskor ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas pad ma chen po byung ngo // pad ma chen po re re la yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la grong
18b8: khyebyer de dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag gru tsam sha stag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang 'obs bdun rim gyis bskor la shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun rim gyis mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas

19a1: pa dang bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la rab de dag kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bag ma chen po sha stag gis bskor te/ ba ga ma thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa gzhon pa
19a2: can 'bras bu dang me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do/ / shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dka' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan cing tshags su rung ba'i byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/ sgra
19a3: de dag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / 'obs de dag thams cad kyang chu bsil zhing shel bzhin du dang bdag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug tu sems cand
19a4: dag rin po che'i gru dang gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do/ / chud dag kyang pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mud shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis brgyan to// 'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang bskyed mos tshal gyi phreng bas
19a5: mdzes par byas te/ bskyed mos tshal re re la yang rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu'i chu dag kyang pad ma dang ud pa la dang / ku mud kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
19a6: sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas so/ / bskyed mos tshal kho ra khor yug na yang dang dur dang / zal mo dang khrung khrung shug dag gis pad ma'i ze 'bru myang bar
19a7: byed do/ / kho ra khor yug gi bskyed mos tshal de dang de dag na yang khang khyim dag yod la/ khang pa re re la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de rtsig pa ni gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel las byas/ sa
19a8: gzhi ni ke ke ru las grub pa ste/ nor bu'i 'jo tshar gyis sbal cing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa gser gyi rta babs chen po dang skar khung dang dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzangs

19b1: mthon pos gzhi ni gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ rdzing bu rnams kyang 'drul pa'i lam gser gyi them skas them pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog thag tu gser gyi chu shing gi phreng bas mdzes par
19b2: byas pa'i lha'i tsan dan gyi dri ba sung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go/ grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu
19b3: med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod do/ / sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste sa phyogs ka tsa lin nga'i gos ltar reg na bde ba tsan dan
19b4: gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ me tog gi sil mas gtor ba/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod do// grong khyer chen po dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma btogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do// pad ma chen
19b5: po de dag la yang seng ge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka ling ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa che ba la 'os pa 'jig rten gsum na phul du bya ba sha stag gis dkris te/ seng
19b6: ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing sems can gzhan dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni yi ge 'dri/ la la ni klog la la ni kha don slob po// de ltar byang chub
19b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang / de dag yongs su spangs nas
19b8: mya ngan gyis gdungs te smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bri zhing 'khod de nyis gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub

20a1: sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas/ zhal zas de dag dang pad med
20a2: dag gi dri bsung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a3: dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug te/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan
20a4: 'das kyi thad du song ste zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi
20a5: gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
20a6: dang / byang phyogs logs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas shes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gi pad ma dang grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga
20a7: ma las nyis gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la pad ma dag gis mchod pa byas te snga ma bzhin du phyogs/
20a8: gcig tu 'khod do// shing sa la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid na dkyil 'khor sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can mi 'khod pa'i go skabs ci yang med do// de na byang chub sems dpa'

20b1: sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang bcas pa de rnams kyang kha gcig ni sa phyogs sbrang bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khor do/ / kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni
20b2: rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yongs su 'khod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do// 'dzam bu'i rming
20b3: gi sems can yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra nams ma gtogs par der ma 'ongs pa su yang med de// tha na mi gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa
20b4: sdom la sogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so/ / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag tu khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nis gcig la gcig pu dang /
20b5: ma dang srid mo dang 'dra bar sems par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de/
20b6: 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so// mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bor ba dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang rngu ba dang tsher ma med par gyur te shing ljon pa rin po che'i 'bri shing gis/
20b7: dkris pa mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to// sems can dar lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi
20b8: gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog

21a1: sna tshogs sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang btsod ka dang shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dgags bya ba gang yin pa de dag gi bya ba thams cad byas te phyir/
21a2: log nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis gnon par gyur to// de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de
21a3: dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas 'jigs shing skyi bud zhes byas te rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na/ gor ma chag
21a4: bar phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas nga ni gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal zas ma bzhes na/ kye ma sems
21a5: can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam/ ci sgyur bar bzhugs par chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam/ ci dam pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam/ kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do// de nas de dag rang rang
21a6: gis yan lag rnams rmas par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to/ / chu klung gser ldan yang khrag tu 'bab par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi ba mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen
21a7: s kul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bcwa lnga dang thabs gcig tu langs te rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig rten dag la ltas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
21a8: te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mchi ma mi thub bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems

21b1: can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tham dbul bar
21b2: 'tshal te/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ phongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te yongs
21b3: su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na khyim bdag gam bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de mthar gyis
21b4: zhing las brtsams nas res rmon glang rmo skyen pa thong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang / rngu ba dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis te re ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las char 'bab pa sdod cing
21b5: mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang ngag gi rmon glang dang shes pa'i thong gshol gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang / rngu
21b6: ba dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa bab pa la sdod cing mchis te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/ bdag gi dbul ba bsal ba
21b7: dang sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra
21b8: gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa

22a1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do/ / de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i
22a2: zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas pa zhes so zhes thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legs so legs so zhes skad chen po
22a3: byud nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod skyid de ba khyod kyis mi lus thob pa ni phan thogs par gyur to// legs par thob po// skul byed 'jig rten na u dum pa ra'i me
22a4: tog bzhin du mdzes pa ni rnyed par dka'o/ / de bas kyang chas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin du dka'o// de bas kyang chos chos thos pa rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang chos de bzhin
22a5: gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba rnyed par dka'o/ / de bas na zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dper na ston zla 'bring po nya la sprin med pa'i
22a6: t she zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na khyod 'ba' shig sems can thams
22a7: cad la mngon du snang ngo / / khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// skul byed khyod ni mi'i lus byed bzhin du lha'i yang lha yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas nas tshigs su
22a8: bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ / khyod ni mi ma yin ta lha mchog yin// mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste// de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs// ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas// bdag cag can/

22b1: la brtse bas skul byed khyod// skye bo rnams la yun tu phan pa'i phyir// 'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la// bzhugs shing rgyun tu bdud rtsi ston ces gsol// srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// gal te khyod kyis
22b2: deri nga ma gsol na/ bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis// de bas phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob// de nas la la zhig pha ma gnyis shi ba las phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa de kho
22b3: na bzhin du mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma deng bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyed//
22b4: mi yi 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod// nga ni rnyed la sogs las 'bral mi 'gyur// mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur// deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di// gser gyi phung po pas kyang lhag pa yin// dpa' bo bde gshegs/
22b5: mgon dang phrad pas na// phyin cad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa// deng rnyed u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs yi dgas 'gro ba yongs spangs shing // lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi
22b6: bzang bcom/ / de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang dang phrad pa// khab kyi rtse mor yongs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas// rtag tu lha'i 'gro bar 'phar bar gyur// chu gnas pad ma chus mi chags pa/
22b7: ltar/ drang srong chen po 'jig rten chas rnams kyis// chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun// drangs phyung bdag nyid 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal// rgya mtsho'i ning gi ru sbal zhar ba'i mgrin// mnya' shing mig tu chung dka' 'drab ma/
22b8: ba gshegs dang phrad de la sbyin pa phul// des na bdag gis nyon mongs gsog kun bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag/ phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni// a ran nga yi me tog 'dra ba zhes des//

23a1: bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di// thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod// khyu mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di nyid la ni
23a2: bdag gis thob/ / de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni// 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur// dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad cher zla// 'di dag/
23a3: mnor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs// lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mthob// mtsho chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar// chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing // dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol// dzaM/
23a4: ltar nyi ma gzi can shar ba na// 'od zer dag gis sprin srab sel ba ltar// drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis// skye bo mang po'i mya ngan deng gsal mdzod// sems can 'di dag dus mos mig skrangs shing // sdug bsngal
23a5: gcig pa'i rgya mtsho'i gting du zhugs/ / de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing // 'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa/ skal byed de ni de bzhin no//
23a6: da ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin du shin du rnyed par dka'o// dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o// chos thos pa yang rnyed par dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bI
23a7: tshezhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'o/ / skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha
23a8: rol du phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' ba skyed cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos

23b1: kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig/ mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig/ 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jig par
23b2: 'gyur/ / 'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin// 'byor pa thams cad chung bar gzhil bar 'gyur// rtag tu lang tse rga bas nges par 'joms// gzugs bzang nad med nad kyis
23b3: 'jig par 'gyur/ / srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin par byed// 'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med// dbang phyug mi rtag tshe yang mi rtag ste// skye bo sdug bsngal 'khor lor rtag tu 'khor// 'jig rten gsum na brtan po ci yang med//
23b4: srid pa dag na 'gro kun gasrog tu 'dug/ srid pa 'jig pa'i chos can rab g.yo ba// 'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med// rga dang 'chi dang nang dang rgud rnams kyi// 'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed// srid pa mtha' med mi
23b5: brtan snying po med/ / thams cad dgra dang 'khu bar shes par gyis// de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis// 'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin// 'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi// rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal
23b6: 'brel ba gang / / mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la// phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dong su zhig dga'// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med// tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag
23b7: mthong na 'dod chags bral/ / de dag spangs bcad grol ba nyid du 'gyur// nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par rgal// nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs// de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa// chags pa kun
23b8: bsal thar pa thob par gyur/ / nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med// nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med// nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis// khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig/ de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar

24a1: ltos/ / nga der yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// bde mchog de ni nga yis chos nyid de// rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyis khyod ma du// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol
24a2: to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so// de ni de lags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom
24a3: ldan 'das kye ma bdag deng du byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal pa chen po dang ldan pa mchod par 'os pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// bcon ldan 'das
24a4: dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu yang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus
24a5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing yang dag par 'dus lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan la
24a6: 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lags so/ / de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// skul byed khyod 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs
24a7: par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lo zhes de skad ma zer cig/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su
24a8: rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni de ltar bslab par bya'o// skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gal te 'du byed du gyur na lha'i yang

24b1: lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ / 'du byed rnams ni chu bur bzhin du shes shing shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no// lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo brgya yang ma thub ste/ de bas na de
