288a6: byed cing sdang ba ston pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir legs par dgongs shig/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gi gan du song nas 'di dag ni ston pa'o// 'di ni 'phags pa'o// zhes skyes
288a7: dpapa de dgal son par 'du shes bskyed de/ des skyes rudam pa de dag gi rkang bal mgo zas phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'gyong // de nas rigs kyi thu grags byin gyis bram pa'i rigs shings la chen po la bu'i bu nyi mas
288a8: sa kyi tham pa rigs shes la chen pa ma zu'i tha nyims byin kyad 'dug gcig ces smras nas tham tha' gas shi sa mtshan po/ bu bu nyim sa byed kyis thad ma pa da gas shin du ri ma bskyed de 'jug pani 'di las/

288b1: narigs kyi mda' mgyos stug gi mdun na 'dug pa bzhin du dam pa de dag la ri mo skyes par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na nad pa nad kyis btab nas yun ring mo las sman pa mthong na dbugs byung ba de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen
288b2: po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de yang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu dbugs byung bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na gas pal thug pa'i mig sad du bkrib las don bya bar 'dod phan par 'dod/ bde bar 'dod pa'i ming 'azhig byung ste/
288b3: des de gsang ba las thar par byas nas de mi de la 'di ni bdag gi skyabs// bdag la snying brtse ba can no zhes byas pa gzo ba skyes so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin la smras
288b4: nyi mas byin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum 'ba' ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
288b5: kha de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgyal ma na 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal
288b6: pa/ / zab pa mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag tu med pa/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa/ byang
288b7: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o// ste stang dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pa la ni shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byams
288b8: bskyed/ ye shes rab tu 'byung rig pa bskyed mngon par shes pa mngon du 'gyur/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos ji

289a1: ltar ston ce na/ nyi mas byin chos thams cad ni nam mkha' la bis pa bzhin du dngos po med pa ste/ chos de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma
289a2: byung mi 'byung ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs ni nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o/ / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o// nyi mas
289a3: byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' 'a bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris
289a4: pa ni ma 'gagra pa ste/ de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang ma 'gags pa'o// tsherab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni mi 'das
289a5: 'gro ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang mi 'ong mi 'gro ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang mi 'ong mi 'gro ba'o// nyi mas bya ni 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni bris pa ma skyes ma byung ba de
289a6: bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'phos ma skyes pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang
289a7: ma bos ma skyes te/ tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / byed dang rnam par shes pa'ang ma 'apos ma skyes so// mas byin 'dig nyid ben nam mkha' la bris pa ni mabyung kun nas ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs ma byung kun nas ma byung ste/ dza ba dang / 'du shes dang /
289a8: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung kun nas ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes shing med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes shing med pa ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

289b1: dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes shing med pa'o// nyi mas kyin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni mazu mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma grub mngon par ma grub ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
289b2: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma grub mngon par ma grub bo// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin
289b3: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin pa de
289b4: bzhin du gzugs kyang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin no// nyams byin 'di la ste/
289b5: dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni tha snyad tsam ste/ nam mkha' la bris pa tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang tha snyad tsam ste/ gzugs tha skad tsam las gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang/
289b6: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang tha skad tsam ste/ tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar kun rdzo
289b7: tsam ste/ / kun rdzob las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las gzugs gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
289b8: 'dra bad dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar

290a1: meng tsam ste/ ming tsam las nam mtha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang mad tsam ste// ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di lta
290a2: ming tsam ste/ mang tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bdu gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las nam mkha' la
290a3: brikhris pa zhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa
290a4: tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/ / nyi mas byin 'di ltar ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhin
290a5: ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam sa// btags pa
290a6: tsam las tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste// 'du shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa
290a7: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las gzugs nagam par shes pa'i bang du gzhan ma yin no// nyims byin 'di lta ste dper nanam mkha'a' bris pa 'ir/
290a8: ma ste/ brda tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar bcwa tsam ste/ brda tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan

290b1: ma yin no/ / nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dpen na tshig gang gis nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin don dam par mi dmigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste// gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos
290b2: de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi kyang ma dmigs/ mabyon pa dang nga ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs so// nyims byed ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
290b3: rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sdug cing pangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten du rtogs par mi blta'o// gang
290b4: ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jog rten gyi grangs su mi 'gro'o/ / gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni gdags par bya ba ma yin// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs paras sa rgyas
290b5: te/ gang ye shapa 'di la gnas pa de dag na 'khong las bskyod pa ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no// gang yag
290b6: la gnas pa de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin/ rnam par byung ba'i chos can ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin/ mazhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin no//
290b7: de pa tham na rigs shings pachen po gabu'i 'khyims byin gyis sgyus drangs pa thags byin kyis pa shad pa la lags pazhes shin du ga rdzab pa yi // nga nas yang skyes byungs pa du garjeg
290b8: gas zam ze'i rigapa shing sa la chen po gabu'i bu'i pas byin rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po la bu'i bu nyimam byin de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi ba khyod kyis choms

291a1: mo 'di thos kyang skrag par ma gyur/ shin du skrag par mgyur/ ma myos myos par ma gyur pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shings
291a2: la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyin par gyur
291a3: to/ / bam po bdun pa ste tha ma// // de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga'
291a4: mchog ces bya ba de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhal la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga'
291a5: mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ / zhi ba'i dbyings la rab bzhugs tshul rnams la// mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni legs so legs// gang gi mi mchog shin tu 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni mi rnams
291a6: dam pa bstan du gsol/ / 'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su// byang chub mchog la mi rnams rab tu 'jug/ gang thos drang srong chen por 'gyur ba dang // tshul de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs/
291a7: bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su// thub pas sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par bstod// rgyal bas de yid rab tu dga' bar mdzad// de dag thos nas shin du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba bdag gis
291a8: 'tshal ba rnams/ / 'dren pa bdag gis chos rnams bshad lags te// ston pas ji ltar chos rnams kun mkhyed pa// 'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol// de la dga' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa yis/

291b1: rgyal sras spyod pa gang la spyad pas na// mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par bstan// thams cad chos shes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig/ mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan
291b2: med pa ste/ / zhab med mo g.yo yon tan med// spobs pa med cing zhi ba 'tsho ba med// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byed pas stong // dngos po nyid med cung zad med pa ste// 'di ni bstan pa ma yin ston pa med// bshad pa med
291b3: 'chad par byed pa'ang med/ / tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang med// shes pa ma yin shes par byed pa'ang med// su la'ang ma yin gang gis kyang min te// 'di dag ma byas byed du bcug pa'ang med// sus kyang blangs pa
291b4: yod cing btang ba'ang med/ / sus kyang bsgrags pa med la thos pa'ang med// sus kyang mi shes rnam par shes pa'ang med// 'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ba med// 'di na zhi ba ma yin rgod pa'ang min zhi bar mi
291b5: byed zhi bar byas pa'ang med/ / byed pa ma yin byed pa med par min// sems pa med cing tshor ba byed pa'ang med// 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas pa'ang min// 'pho ba ma yin mi 'pho ba yang min// 'ongs pa med cing 'gro ba yod
291b6: payin/ / 'di na kun du mi 'chi skye ba med// skye ba med cing bskyed pa'ang ma yin te// 'di ni 'gags pa med pa 'gags pa'ang min// 'di ni brtan pa med cing bshig pa'ang med// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams bshig pa
291b7: ya8/ / da ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shes par gyis// 'dren pa bde bar gshegs pa gang 'das pa// de dag gis kyang tshul 'di rab tu bstan// dre pa sangs rgyas mabyon 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par
291b8: 'brung / / rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba// rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul 'di ston// chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu shes

292a1: 'gyur te/ mkhas pas shes par dka' ba rab tu bstan// rgyal ba'i thugs sras ji tsam shes pa dag/ 'gro ba btsos pa 'di la mya ngan med// de la snying rje bla na med pa ste/ 'gro ba kun la byams
292a2: par shin tu gnas par gyur/ stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur pas na/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tsom med/ mtshan ma med par gnas par gyur pas na/ de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod med de/ rlung rnams nam mkha' dag la mi
292a3: thogs bzhin/ dpa' ba de dag 'gro bar ma chags so// bskal pa mang por bye bar kun 'khor zhing / sems can bye ba mang po ston par byed/ kun du kun nas nyon mongs mi 'gyur te/ des ni byang chub dam pa 'chang rgya rus/ gal
292a4: te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan te/ / de dag nyan thos gyis shes sman yang // ras ni chos nyid yang dag rab rtogs te/ khyod ni 'dren pa min zhes de smra'o// dri ma med pa'i ye shes mig sbyangs te/ bdag ni
292a5: the tshom ma lus rnam par byad/ / stong par bdag ni gzhan dring gyi mi 'jog/ khyod ni gang zag mchog min par ded shig/ de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstan pas na// gang la 'dres pa'i sras rnams gnas pa la// bye ba
292a6: khrag khrag bdud gyis thub dka' ste/ / ji ltar ri bo bskyod par mi nus bzhin// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan
292a7: pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu'i thob pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
292a8: napag tu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khri/

292b1: dpag tu med pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa yang mthong // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis mchod cing yum gyi drung du 'gro ba yang mthong // byang chub
292b2: sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor ba yang mthong / / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong / byang chub sems//
292b3: dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong // sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la brgya byini dang tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo
292b4: bskor bar gsol ba yang mthong / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spyod lam dpag tu med pa
292b5: rnams kyis sems can rnams 'dul ba yang mthong / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
292b6: ngad las 'das pa yang mthong ngo / / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin par snang la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pas
292b7: mngon par bstod pa/ / legs so legs so rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa// bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes bzhin du/ dngos bral mtshungs med ci yang pa
292b8: lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis nam mkha' bris pa bzhin/ de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te/ sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan sprul bzhin// yang dag tu na rgyal bas bstan ma mchis// sos ka'i dus kyi smin rgyu ji

293a1: bzhin pa/ snang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te// ston pa gang lags de yang de dang 'dra// sngon chad the tshom nem nur gang byung ba// de yang 'dren pa'i drang du bral wA
293a2: de bar gshegs pas gsungs pa chos kyang rig/ 'gro bsgol mdzad rnam par 'dren par shog/ skabs bcu dag gis bsgrubs patsa 'dra bar// rgyal ba'i nid mchog bzang ba rgyad par ba ni// sangs rgyas rgyal ba gang ga
293a3: gtsor gyur te/ / skye bo ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par bgyi// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang ma mchis pa'i// skyabs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thar bgyi ste// rga shi bral ba'i
293a4: gnas kyang bstan par bgyi/ / bye ga khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi// sams can bdud kyi yul nas stobs nus su// drang srong chen po'i yul du drang bar bgyi// bde bar gshes
293a5: pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa/ / gang gis thos nas gang la'ang mi reg pa// de dag mchog gi tshul la gnas par 'gyur// 'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// chos nyid 'di ltar mi gang rab rtogs shing //
293a6: ston pa rgyal ba'i dbang po'i spyan snga nas// bstan bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba// de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur// stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing // stong par dmigs pa'i
293a7: 'dra shes bral gyur na/ / de dag ma smras bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid// mkhas pa sog pa la ni mi dga' ste// zas kyi ro rnams la yang chags ma mchis// rtogs pa
293a8: dgon pa'i gnas la shin du mos/ / de dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur// sbyangs pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag/ de la rtag tu rab tu gnas par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu

293b1: dka'/ rab tu dga' bas byang chub mchog kyang thob// de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngags// de la mkhas pa gnas pas 'di mthong ste// zhi ba gang la bde gshegs gnas pa yi// byang chub de ni 'jig rten
293b2: 'dun pas bsngags/ / 'dren pa khyod las stong pa dang thos te// ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis bsrubs// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur bar bgyi// ma mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par dgrol// thub pa/
293b3: khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing // chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tshom thabral// de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// 'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i// bsod/
293b4: rnams mi chud bdag gis bsags pas na// bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis// mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis bcom
293b5: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang myos pa dang glen par ma gyur to/ /
293b6: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur to// nams kyang log par ltung bar ma gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par ma gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi dor lta bar ma
293b7: gyur to/ / nams kyang bskal pa brjod du med par tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du
293b8: sems/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byani zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs

294a1: kyi bu ba'ang skyong zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bla grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mkhas pa'i snying par gyur pa
294a2: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dusan rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar
294a3: gur to/ / thams cad zil gyis gnan pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na can dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
294a4: rlob sems dpa' slob byin zhes bya ba de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mag
294a5: ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' da dpon bzang po de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to// de
294a6: bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no// gang de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' babang
294a7: myong yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu kun du 'dzin par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni byang chub
294a8: sems dpa' tshu'i lha yin no/ / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji sam du sa mas/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po la bu'i bu ki mas byin zhes byab khrur pa dgazhan zhig yin pa

294b1: snyam du 'dzin na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus nabram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur
294b2: ko/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi drang la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis me bkri ba 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dar mi blta par 'dod na chos kyi
294b3: dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ 'grogs par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dre ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o// de nas 'jam
294b4: dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis
294b5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
294b6: kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dang rtsa dang / shing dang yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu
294b7: byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi sa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos
294b8: kyi dbyings su yongasu zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni bgrang bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs

295a1: med/ dpag ta med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma
295a2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
295a3: nyan mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
295a4: rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang dge slong dpa' sa zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs la bye brag phyed pa/ rtogs pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
295a5: ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim gro byed par gyur to/ / des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad bcu'i bar du shin du
295a6: gus par byas te/ bshad pa'i rnams kyang gzungs su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad bcu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim
295a7: gro byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rna bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
295a8: rang la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis bstan bkur byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang bar dang / tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa'i rnams yongs su bzung bar

295b1: gyur to/ / de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa
295b2: de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang bar dang / tha ma dus gsum du
295b3: bstan pa'i rnams yongs su bzung ngo / / de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
295b4: ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de bzhin gshes pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya bcur gyur te/ de la yang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal pa bye ba brgya bcu'i bar du yid
295b5: du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa brgya bcu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur te/ nam
295b6: mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to/ / bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcu'i bar du chos thams cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/ dpa' sra 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi
295b7: nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams cad ni chung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/
295b8: ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag pa

296a1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong / kha cig ni blan med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig
296a2: ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po
296a3: de la zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la// shin du gus pa chen po bskyed nas su// sngon gyi 'dren pa
296a4: dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ / sems ni nams kyang gzhan du ma bsams te// rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la gzhag/ chos rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan// de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsams// /
296a5: bdag tu smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa// mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis gnan// chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin// de la bdag ni the tshom cang ma mchis// mig 'di dam pa'i don du stong par ni//
296a6: bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs// maM 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te// 'dzangs pa ma lags me rnams 'di la bslad// nges par sna lde rna pa de bzhin te/ lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags/
296a7: de bzhin sems dang sems dpa'ang stong pa nyid/ sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags// gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rnam par dben zhing stong // sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste//
296a8: skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong // de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid kyis stong / bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste/ 'dzangs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslad// gang na'ang stong

296b1: par rig pa ma mchis par/ / nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs// gang na'ang ngo ba nyid ni ma mchis pa// de ni rnams kyang gzhin gyi b+hur mi 'gyur// gang gang po nyid ni mi rnyed pa// rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan
296b2: gyi rkyen/ / rang bzhin med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bskyed// rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o// thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas// mi 'gyur 'tshe ba ma mchis zhi ba ste// ji ltar nam mkha' rig pa ma mchi
296b3: ltar/ / de la mi 'dzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi skul ba// de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus// 'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i// chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu
296b4: bstan/ / gang gis yang dag chos rnams des rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba rnam 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyis// gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis// gang gi tshul bzhin rab
296b5: du chos rtogs pa/ / des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs bkur stir bgyis// de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te// byang chub mchog tu de dag 'tshang yang rgya// gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa/
296b6: mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa des bzung ste// byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya// rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de// byang chub sems dpa'
296b7: khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung / / bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub phyir// de la mkhas pa the tshom gzhir mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa// chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis
296b8: 'chal/ / 'den pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur// shin du sdug bsngal skye bo rnams par dgrol// 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig pas na// bdag gis de ring chos kyi yab la mchod// gang slang mi yi/

297a1: gtso bo khyod 'phags pas// de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su mchi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid
297a2: dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzungs dang / zhi gnas dang / shes rab kyis sems can thams cad zil gyis mnan to//
297a3: 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' srar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zib
297a4: gyis gnon pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su
297a5: sbyang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bslab par bya'o/ / de la slob pa'i tshe yang sems gang la yang ma chags mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing thogs pa med pas bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs
297a6: pa de dang de yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal da stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa na/ ye shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu
297a7: thob po/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na rtag tu snang bar byas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
297a8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcwa brgyad bdas pa na rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de de na nga la

297b1: sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu 'das pa na dge ba bsags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod
297b2: de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
297b3: bcwa 'das pa na bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ den da la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsed kyi phung po zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs ras
297b4: rgyung gyi zhings la phrag gnyis 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpas
297b5: gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brgyad brgya 'das pa zhi ba skyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can
297b6: rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na sprin gyi kha dog
297b7: ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs car
297b8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

298a1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sumakhri brgyad stong 'das pa na me long dkyil 'khor snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod
298a2: de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
298a3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgyad bcu 'das pa na zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms
298a4: pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na dus las 'das shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
298a5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshe
298a6: mnyar zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi
298a7: logs char 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
298a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na pa

298b1: srad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do/ / de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
298b2: shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rin po che kun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams
298b3: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu
298b4: rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
298b5: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtul zhugs spyad ces bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcwa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
298b6: 'das pa na yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ / de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud rgyal po zhes bya bar shes
298b7: so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na nges par song ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
298b8: de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing

299a1: brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
299a2: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs car sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
299a3: snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas
299a4: med par spyod ces bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na me tog bkram pa zhes
299a5: bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyog
299a6: ra sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams
299a7: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa'i lha zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul par
299a8: kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na lhas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal

299b1: k yigyiphyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
299b2: yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shir gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi ning
299b3: brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa nam smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na da la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po
299b4: shes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs tshang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
299b5: khams yad de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chad gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams
299b6: yod de/ de na da la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsol pa byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal
299b7: sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs shes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
299b8: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po shes bya bar shes so//

300a1: 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chang sngang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sa pa
300a2: rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na grags can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ral sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa
300a3: zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na gzi brjid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
300a4: yod do/ / de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa gsum bcu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs
300a5: rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chang
300a6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
300a7: gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin
300a8: chen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na da la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum

300b1: srin bzhi rdul zarab kyi rdul snyan kyi sangs rgyas kyi nang 'das pa na na maca rgyal zhes bya ba'i 'dzag tan gyi khams yod/ don ral sems can rnams kyas bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya ba nas pa/
300b2: 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen me tog shin du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
300b3: khams yod de/ de na da la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
300b4: snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na shin du mdzes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
300b5: shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams
300b6: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sang
300b7: rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad
300b8: grub pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe de la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad par shes pa ni brjod du med pa'i

301a1: bskal pas spras kyang sha kyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngal sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin
301a2: gshegs par shes pa yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mi rig go/ 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chud pa rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med
301a3: pa thos na myos par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang
301a4: 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tshom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci spos/ 'jam dpal
301a5: ngas sngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
301a6: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus nang ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa/
301a7: brtson 'grus mtha' yas de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad bcus yongs su bskor bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu
301a8: med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa nas theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

301b1: tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas
301b2: n gas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
301b3: kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas nges bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
301b4: m ed pa yongs su dag par lung ston mod kyi 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas de ltar ngas
301b5: de'i 'og du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
301b6: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na/ bsam gyis mi khyab 'das pa'i dus// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bskyed phyi
301b7: de na nga yis brtson 'grus brtsams/ / brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba/ gang zag mtshungs pa med pa byung // sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston// sangs rgyas chos la dbang
301b8: byed cing / / stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin// mi 'jigs pa la shin du gnas// so so yang dag rig la mkhas// gnas dang gnas min dbang yang thob// las dang ye shes rtogs par rig/ las rnams

302a1: yang dag 'dzin pa dang / / rnam par smin la the tshom med// khams rnams du mar shes pa dang // rnam par 'dren pa shin du ldan// sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen//
302a2: sems can rnams kyi dbang po yi// rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams// ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol byin// snyoms
302a3: par 'jug dang tshad med la/ / rkang gnyis dam pa shin du bslabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin// des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa
302a4: med/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya dris te/ sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba// bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen//
302a5: gang rnams khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa// de 'dra'i chos ni yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing gi skyen rnams dang // yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bo bshad du gsol// sems
302a6: can rnams kyi smin pa dang / / ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba// nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas// mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor// mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa// nyen mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// de yi lam dang bsam
302a7: pa rnams/ / 'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang // byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang // ji ltar de las ldang ba rnams// ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa// ji snyed ting
302a8: nge 'dzin rnams dang / / zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams// rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen// ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang // gang gis rkyen gyis bshad pa yang // de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te// de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod// khyod

302b1: kyis bskal pa byed smad pas/ / ye shes 'di las nges par byung // ston pas stobs kyis mthu yang brnyes// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba yi// bdag dang po rol rnams kyi yang // spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing //
302b2: bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen// gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis// ji lta bur yang rab tu mkhyen// gang du ji 'dra skye ba dang // gang du rigs kyang ci 'dra ba// ji ltar kun du
302b3: spyad pa rnams/ / de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tha ma'i chos rnams ci 'dra ba// 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang // 'gro ba gang du skye ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// ci 'dra ba yi ye shes kyis// sngon chad rnam
302b4: par lung bstan pa/ / mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pas// de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod// tshul khrims gang dang chos gang dang // ci 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang // ye shes gang la zhugs pa yang // de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang
302b5: dang gang gi las kyi su/ / skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang // de dag mgon po rab tu mkhyen// gang du gnas pa de dag gi/ rgyun du mchi bar nges pa yang // de yang khyod kyis ma lus mkhyen// de skad
302b6: yid gnyis mi mnga' khyed/ / gang gi lus kyis sems gang skyes// de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa// de yang 'dren pas shin du mkhyen// sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni// khyod dang 'dra ba yod ma/
302b7: mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams dang // 'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra// srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams// rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen// de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'// gang
302b8: dang gang gi lus kyi su/ / ji lta bu yi rgyud du mchi// de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen// de slad rgyal bas lhag ma mchis// 'dren pa chos rnams thams cad la// khyod ni the tshom yod mi mnga'// sems can kun gyi spyod

303a1: yul yang / sas rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gtsigs/ skye ba dang na 'chi po mkhyen// khyod 'dra ba na yod ma gdal/ ltung bcas 'jig tan thams cadan// thub pa khyod las lhags sa sa// bag pazang bar
303a2: rab tu mkhyen/ / ma lus pa yang rtogs par gyur// nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spangs// khyod kyis bag chags kun kyang bcom// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang // spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen// gang la nyon
303a3: mongs spyod yul dang / / nyon mongs 'di dag gang 'byung mkhyen// nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na// bag chags rdzas su 'jug pa'i rnams// de dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te// de las khyod ni pha rol phyin// bdag dang pha rol rnam
303a4: kyi yang / / nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi// lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen// de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas// 'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa// mtha' yas brtson 'grus de bstod nas// bskul bye khrag khrig ma'
303a5: yas par/ / 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas g+ha ris nga skyes te// rtag par lha yi dbang por gyur// bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la// rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan// lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te// mi yi dbang po
303a6: rgyal por gyur/ / sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan// de dag nga yi chos thos nas// sti stang mtshungs med bskyed nas su// sems kyi thams cad nyer bzhag ste// dri med sems kyis/
303a7: de dag nyan// sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa// byang chub mchog la nges par gyur// nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bshad kyang // bskal
303a8: pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ / rgya chen bshad pa mi zad do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang // drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags la// thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad// de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan// gang 'dir

303b1: sangs rgyas sngags pa dang / / sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang // bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa// gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad// zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi rnyed//
303b2: kad la bshad pa de yang stong // 'di la mgon med 'gro ba myos// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs
303b3: su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par stong nas bud med kyi dbang po las gyur te/ de phyin chad dbud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing
303b4: tshad med pa yongs su spang bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
303b5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos// ldeg/ rab
303b6: tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ud/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur bur/ chemachem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub
303b7: phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dmar na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dmar na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dmara' na lho phyogs mtho// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// srog chags bye/
303b8: ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul

304a1: med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa rnams dang / lha dang
304a2: mir bcas pa'i skyes dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong
304a3: po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba theg pa
304a4: chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas slad kyis gtan la phab pa//
304a5: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su brta sU tra ma hA yA na nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
304a6: skang ba dag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
304a7: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ci ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub kyi sems ni gser dang rang bzhin 'dra bar gnas par blta bar
304a8: bgyi'o/ / gser rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ltar byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par gnas so// mgar pas gser la bzo'i bye brag tha dad par byas kyang gser rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba ltar/

304b1: byang chub kyi sems la yon tan khyad par sna tshogs par snang yang don dam par byang chub kyi sems las ma g.yos par rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
304b2: pa/ byang chub sems nyid rnam par dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la brtson// dngos med do bo nyid du thos// shes rab skye ba'i rgyal mos// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
304b3: dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
304b4: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // 'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// /
304b5: rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya su bar+N+Na bA lu ko ba ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
304b6: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu
304b7: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas bus
304b8: mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

305a1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das cad bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan/
305a2: dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
305a3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no//
305a4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
305a5: rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/
305a6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
305a7: rnams ni dpag tu med do/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
305a8: kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yul shes pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod pam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan

305b1: 'das la tsha dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis mngon
305b2: sum du thos na yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis maud
305b3: gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag du 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag
305b4: du mchi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o// de ci'i
305b5: phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo dper na rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong pa/ chus gang ba/ bya khrus btung du rung bar mu
305b6: dang kha da chad du 'dug pa/ pad ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod la de nas mi la la zhig gis rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la zhon te/ de yang myu khyud
305b7: kyi shing yang tshul ma reg/ rta rnams kyi rmig pa yang tshul mi reg/ pad ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis/ mi brtol ba tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang mgyogs pa de
305b8: bus rmug kun dga' ba de nas rdzid de'i nang nas/ sbrul gdug pa zhig byung bas shing te de mtsha'i nang nas/ byir ma log pa de yang ban 'asu shing rta lan brgyad bzhang na/

306a1: kun dga' bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan gcig bskor ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar bskabs su kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo khyod ci/
306a2: gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su maud gal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo mod gal gyi bu chen po tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar
306a3: skabs su gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ / gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su rang sangs rgyas chos
306a4: bstan pa rnam pa grangs med pa ston to/ / rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa
306a5: ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar bskabs su kun dga' bo gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o// /
306a6: kun dga' bo rdzu 'phral gyi stobs skyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
306a7: dang / zang phyogs dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams dang de bzhin du sted dang 'og gi phyogs su nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du
306a8: nga la mi bso bar song la/ / de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rabs bskor te ra bas bskor nas rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / gyo dul med pa byas te mthon dman med

306b1: 'a she tu byas la grong khyer gcig tu byas nas kyang yungs 'bras bkang ste b+har bungar byas na/ kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig tan gyi khams/
306b2: dag na sems can byang chub la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo //
306b3: de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub
306b4: sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas
306b5: 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
306b6: khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa'i rtsed mo ston
306b7: pa dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i
306b8: 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/

307a1: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar rangs mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo //
307a2: de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la gces par byed pa'i mchog dang gus pa chen pos lan gsum skor ba byed pa dgangs mthong ngo //
307a3: de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang
307a4: chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
307a5: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
307a6: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo / / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas
307a7: kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa dang
307a8: gdung 'thun pa sha stag yin na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dang / byang chub

307b1: chub kyi snying po la skor ba byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi shing drang na 'dug pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya/
307b2: ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi
307b3: gyi 'ams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten khams ji snyed mchis lags/
307b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub
307b5: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni kun dga' bo dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du
307b6: 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na dkon te//
307b7: kun dga' bo ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa de bzhin du gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang /
307b8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems de pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

308a1: bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
308a2: bstod do/ / / 'phags pa gser gyi byim lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren po d+hi dang /
308a3: pra dz+nyA ba ma dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsub ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// oM ye d+ha shwe ta pra prA b+ha he tun+te nA thAg to ba da te/ mon d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//
